decks.notes: Utilize a variety of removal spells and efficient creatures to control the board and outvalue your opponent. Make use of cards like Chainer's Edict and Pestilence to clear the opponent's creatures while maintaining a board presence with resilient creatures like Guardian of the Guildpact and Dawnbringer Cleric. Gain incremental value and card advantage with cards like Thraben Inspector and Spare Supplies. Use life gain effects and card recursion to outlast your opponent and grind out a victory. Employ the Orzhov Pestilence synergy to control the game and secure a win.

The deck focuses on quickly flooding the board with low-cost creatures and artifacts, using efficient removal spells to clear the way for aggressive attacks. By utilizing cards that generate value through sacrificing artifacts and recurring creatures, the deck can maintain constant pressure on the opponent. The mana base is designed to support the aggressive strategy, with a mixture of lands that provide colored mana and utility lands for additional life gain. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and relentless offense.

This Golgari Aggro deck focuses on quickly building a board presence by sacrificing creatures for value and using cards like Deadly Dispute and Unearth to keep up the pressure. With efficient removal like Cast Down and Snuff Out, along with disruption from Duress, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while steadily growing its own army. Cards like Falkenrath Noble and Carrion Feeder provide reach and inevitability, while synergies between creatures like Ivy Lane Denizen and Safehold Elite help to create a threatening board state that overwhelms the opponent.
